node.data: {"title":"Summer School","location":"Bucharest","expect":"What to expect from the summer school:","general":{"description":"The summer school will take place in Bucharest, according to the schedule below:","program":["5 days of tutorials and working together","3-4 hours a day","In a chill location in Bucharest","You will learn how to write a full project adequate for your skill level","We will arrange the projects for publication"]},"beginner":{"title":"Beginners","description":"We recommend the beginner program for high school students, regardless of whether they have worked with AI before or are new to it.","expect":"What to expect from the summer school:","program":["Python: syntax, classes, useful libraries","Types of training. Types of models","Basic models: how and why they work","Text processing: problems and solutions","Writing a scientific paper","Base instruments and techniques: Jupyter Notebook, Git, LaTex"]},"advanced":{"title":"Advanced","description":"We recommend the advanced program for more experienced university students, that already know the basics and are ready to get to the next level.","expect":"What to expect from the summer school:","program":["Neural networks, transformers, LLMs: mathematical intuition","Training an LLM for Romanian","Interdisciplinarity in Artificial Intelligence","Reinforcement Learning in GameDev","Preparing a publication"]},"confusion":"Unsure which is track is for you? Let us know and we can help you out!"}
